name: Clumsy Ted Pushes Blocks
description:
I made this in a day for https://itch.io/jam/krass-jam

The theme chosen  was "An indie game where you experience the clumsiness of things that look like you and also you push around blocks".

I wouldn't really call it fun, but it's a game and it's beatable in less than 3 minutes!

[WARNING}: Music might be loud and game contains blood.
